segments.text: Look at that woman, drying dishes like it's the only thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got no idea the sink is flooding the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she miss that? Water everywhere, and she's just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are at it, climbing for cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool—it's ridiculous, he's going to break something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stealing treats when they shouldn't, right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl egging him on, reaching for her share—naughty kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, and no one cares about the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is what happens when adults aren't paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are open, cookies spilling out probably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet she'll be furious when she finally sees this disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The nice garden view is wasted on this indoor nonsense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stop this before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
